Genre: English mystery and miracle plays.

Introitus Moyses He Ã¾at made all thynge of nought Hevyn and erth both sunne and mone Saue all Ã¾at his hand hath wrought All myghty god in hevyn trone I am Moyses Ã¾at make Ã¾is bone I pray Ã¾e lord god with all my mende to us incline Ã¾i mercy sone Ã¾i gracyous lordchep lete us fynde. The to plesyn in all degre Gracyous god and lord ovyr all Ã¾ou graunte us grace wher so we be and saue us sownd fro synfull fall thy wyll to werke to us Ã¾i thrall enforme and teche us all Ã¾i plesans in purenesse put us Ã¾at nevyr not fall and grounde us in grace ffrom all grevauns. Hic moyses videns rubrum ardentem admirande dicit A mercy god what menyth ?on syte A grene busch as fyre doth flame and kepyth his colowre fayr and bryghte Ffresch and grene with-owtyn blame It fyguryth sum thynge of ryght gret fame I kan not seyn what it may be I wyll go nere in goddys name and wysely loke Ã¾is busch to se. Deus Moyses how Moyses herke to me a-non Ã¾is stounde. Moyses I am here lorde with-owtyn les ?owre gracyous wyll to do I am bounde. Deus Thu take Ã¾i schon anon ful rownde of Ã¾i fete in hast lete se fful holy is Ã¾at place and grownde Ã¾er Ã¾ou dost stonde I sey to the. Moyses Barfoot now I do me make and pull of my schon fro my fete now haue I my schon of take what is ?our wyll lord fayn wold I wete. Deus Come nere moyses with me to mete these tabell-is I take Ã¾e in Ã¾in honde with my ffynger in hem is wrete all my lawys Ã¾ou vndyrstonde. Loke Ã¾at Ã¾ou preche all abowte hoo so wyll haue frenshipp of me to my lawys loke Ã¾ei lowte Ã¾at Ã¾ei be kept in all degre Go forth and preche a-non let se loke Ã¾ou not ses nyght nor day. Moyses ?our byddyng lord all wrought xal be ?our wyll to werk I walk my way. Custodi precepta domini dei tui deutronomini vjt o. The comaundement of Ã¾i lord god man loke Ã¾ou kepe where Ã¾at Ã¾ou walk wake or slepe Euery man take good hede and to my techynge take good intent for god hath sent me now in dede ?ow for to enforme his comaundment ?ow to teche god hath me sent his lawys of lyff Ã¾at arn ful wyse them to lerne be dyligent ?our soulys may Ã¾ei saue at Ã¾e last Asyse. The preceptys Ã¾at taught xal be be wretyn in Ã¾ese tablys tweyn In Ã¾e fyrst ben wretyn thre that towch to god Ã¾is is serteyn In Ã¾e secund tabyl be wretyn ful pleyn Ã¾e tother vij Ã¾at towch mankende herk now well man what I xal seyn and prent Ã¾ise lawys well in Ã¾i mende. 1u s Primum mandatum non habebis deos alienos. The fyrst comaundement of god as I ?ow say of Ã¾e fyrst tabyl for sothe is this Ã¾ou xalt haue neythyr nyght nore day noon other god but Ã¾e kyng of blysse Vndyrstonde wele what menyth this Euery man in hys degre And sett neuyr ?our hert a-mys Vpon Ã¾is werdlys vanyte. Ffor if Ã¾ou sett Ã¾i loue so sore Vpon ryches and werdly good Ã¾i wurdly rycches Ã¾ou takyst ever more evyn ffor Ã¾i god as man ovyr wood Amend Ã¾e man and chaunge Ã¾i mood lese not Ã¾i sowle for werdlys welth Only hym loue which bodyly ffood doth ?eve all day and gostly helth. 2. Secundum mandatum non assumens nomen dei tui in vanum. The secund precept of Ã¾e fyrst tabyll Ã¾e name of god take nevyr in vayne Swere none othis be noon fals fabyll Ã¾e name of god Ã¾ou nevyr dysteyn Be whare of othis for dowte of peyn Amonges ffelacheppe whan Ã¾ou dost sytt A lytyl othe Ã¾is is serteyn may dampne thy sowle to helle pytt. Man whan Ã¾ou art sett at Ã¾e nale and hast Ã¾i langage as plesyth Ã¾e loke Ã¾in othis be non or smale and ?ett alwey loke trewe thei be But swere not oftyn by rede of me ffor yf Ã¾ou vse oftyn tyme to swere it may gendyr custom in the by-ware of custom ffor he wyl dere. 3. Tercium mandatum memento vt sabbatum sanctificet. The iijd e comaundment of god as I rede doth bydde the halwe well Ã¾in haly day kepe Ã¾e well ffro synfull dede and care not gretly ffor rych a-ray A ryght pore man Ã¾is is non nay of sympyl astat in clothis rent may-be bettyr than rych with garmentys gay Oftyn tyme doth kepe Ã¾is comaundment. Ffor rych men do showe oftyn tyme pompe and pride On halydays as oftyn is sene Whan pore men passe and go be-syde At wurthy festys riche men woll bene Thyn halyday Ã¾ou kepyst not clene In gloteny to lede Ã¾i lyff In goddys hous ?e xulde be-dene honoure ?our god both mayden and wyff. 4. Quartum mandatum honora patrem tuum et matrem tuam. Off Ã¾e secunde tabyll Ã¾e fyrst comaundement And in Ã¾e ordyr Ã¾e iiijt e I sey in fay he byddyth Ã¾e euer more with hert bent both ffadyr and modyr to wurchep Alway Thow Ã¾at Ã¾i fadyr be pore of array and Ã¾ow neuer so rych of golde and good ?itt loke Ã¾ou wurchep hym nyght and day Of whom Ã¾ou hast both fflesch and blood. In Ã¾is comaundmente includyd is thi bodyli fadyr and modyr also Includyd also I fynde in Ã¾is thi gostly fadyr and modyr Ã¾er to To Ã¾i gostly ffadyr evyr reuerens do Ã¾i gostly modyr is holy cherch these tweyn saue Ã¾i sowle fro woo euer them to wurchep loke Ã¾at Ã¾ou werch. 5. Quintum mandatum non occides. The ffyfft comaundement byddyth all us Scle no man no whight Ã¾at Ã¾ou kyll Vndyr stonde Ã¾is precept Ã¾us Scle no wyght with wurd nor wyll Wykkyd worde werkyht oftyn tyme grett ill be war Ã¾er fore of wykkyd langage wyckyd spech many on doth spyll therfore of spech beth not owt-rage. 6. Sextum mandatum non makaberis. The sexte comaundement byddith every man Ã¾at no wyght lede no lecherous lay fforfet neuer be no woman lesse Ã¾an Ã¾e lawe a-lowe Ã¾i play Trespas nevyr with wyff ne may with wedow nor with non othyr wyght kepe Ã¾e cleue as I Ã¾e say to whom Ã¾ou hast Ã¾i trowth plyght. 7. Septimum mandatum non furtum facies. Do no thefte no thynge Ã¾ou stele Ã¾e vijt e precept byddyth Ã¾e ful sore whyll Ã¾ou arte in welth and wele euyll gett good loke Ã¾ou restore Off handys and dede be trewe euyr more ffor yf Ã¾in handys lymyd be Ã¾ou art but shent Ã¾i name is lore in ffelde and town and in all countre. 8. Octauum mandatum non loqueris contra proximum tuum falsum testimonium. The viijt e precept Ã¾us doth Ã¾e bydde Ffals wyttnes loke non Ã¾ou bere Ã¾e trowth nevyr more loke Ã¾at Ã¾ou hyde with ffals wyttnes no man Ã¾ou dere Nowther ffor love ne dred ne fere Sey non other than trowth is Ffals wytnes yf Ã¾at Ã¾ou rere A?ens god Ã¾ou dost grettly amys. 9. Nonum mandatum non desiderabis vxorem proximi tui et cetera. The ixt e precept of lawe of lyff evyn Ã¾us doth bydde every man desyre not Ã¾i neyborys wyff Ã¾ow she be fayr and whyte as swan And Ã¾i wyff brown ?itt natt for than Ã¾i neyborys wyff Ã¾ou nevyr rejoyse kepe Ã¾e clene as evyr Ã¾ou can to Ã¾in owyn wyff and Ã¾in owyn choyse. 10. Decimum mandatum non concupisces domum proximi tui non seruum non ancillam non bos non asinum nec omnia que illius sunt et cetera. The xd e comaundement of god and last is Ã¾is thi neyborys hous desyre Ã¾ou nowth Maydon nor servaunt nor nowth of his desyre hem nevyr in wyll nor thowth Oxe nere Asse Ã¾at he hath bought nere no thynge Ã¾at longyht hym to Godys lawe must nedys be wrought desyre no thynge Ã¾in neybore ffro. The vjt e comaundement of lechory doth exclude Ã¾e synfull dede but theys tweyn last most streytly both dede and thought Ã¾ei do for-bede In wyll nere thought no lechory Ã¾ou lede Ã¾i thought and wyll Ã¾ou must refreyn All Ã¾i desyre as I Ã¾e rede in clennes of lyff Ã¾i self restreyn. Ffrendys Ã¾ese be Ã¾e lawys Ã¾at ?e must kepe therfore every man sett well in mende Wethyr Ã¾at Ã¾ou do wake or slepe these lawys to lerne Ã¾ou herke ful hynde And godys grace xal be Ã¾i ffrende he socowre and saue ?ow in welth fro woo Fare well gode frendys for hens wyll I wende my tale I haue taught ?ow my wey now I goo. Explicit moyses.
